title: bad coding in league cause random frame rates?
body: i just got a brand new pc from xidax with a r7 and 580 so play league no  problem how ever . come to find out  the frame rate being a roller coaster obviously riots problem . any one else besides me just to  confirm that the frame rate is like a roller coaster even standing still in one place.  . update today . doing  league update on the new system IM SHOCKED every thing is pretty much on lock down  tell game updates. bad coding in worst way
